content: pop star designer aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2 designs©2015 size ​6 square using ​hook ​ h/5 0mm ​yarn ​ worsted weight in 2 colors a & b ______________________________________________________________ abbreviations & stitches used beg=​beginning chain=​chain slip_stitch=​slip_stitch single_crochet=​single_crochet space=​spaces skip​=skip w/=​with double_crochet=​double_crochet st s =​stitch es lps=​loops fpdc=​front post double_crochet ​popcorn=​popcorn half_double_crochet=​half double_crochet​ spdec=​special decrease __________________________________________________________ notes​ ​ ​ bobble​l​d print​ ​ repeated in pattern ​sts​ work in next st/chsp ​join ​ ​join w/slip_stitch in beg st unless otherwise stated ​popcorn ​ 4dc in st remove hook insert hook in 1st double_crochet worked grab lps from 4th double_crochet and pull through ​spdec ​ insert hook in next st pull up a lp yo insert hk around the top of the popcorn st in round below pull up a lp yo draw through 2lps yo draw through last 3lps or see ​https //www youtube com/watch v=ymkpqrdajm8 round 1 w/a ch4 14dc in 4th chain from hook join 15dc round 2 ch3 double_crochet in same st ch1 2dc in next st popcorn in next st 2dc in next st repeat around ending w/popcorn in last st join 20dc 5pc aurora suominen/dragonflymomof2designs ©copyright join 35dc 5pc round 4 ch1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in 6sts spdec*see notes single_crochet in 7sts repeat around ending w/spdec st join 35sc 5pc round 5 ch3 double_crochet ch1 2dc in same st double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in 7sts double_crochet in next st ​ 2dc ch1 2dc in next st corner made​ repeat around ending w/double_crochet in last st join 24dc 28hdc round 6 ch3 double_crochet in next st corner in next space double_crochet in 13sts repeat around ending w/double_crochet in last 11sts join 68dc fasten_off personal use/print only no pattern reproductions
